name: Markiplier Tamagotchi
description:
Care for and love your very own Mark Fischbach as if it were your own child! Feed him, nurture him, and let him game to his cute little heart's content!

Includes

4 stats to alert when Mark needs care!

11 different actions with varied animations!

Real-time integration!

20+ voice lines to alert when Mark needs something!

Pong!

Death!

Customizable backgrounds!

3 different difficulties!

High scores!

A secret achievement!

And much more!

Use the arrow keys to navigate menus and enter to select!

Please share any epic ideas you have or bugs you find B)
